title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Memorial Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: I Interviewed in a 3 person panel for the NICU. They were very informative. Be honest and not scripted in order to carry on the conversation. My interview lasted about 36 minutes, however was given a 30 minute time slot. Still waiting to hear back.
Interview Questions: Asked behavioral style questions including challenges. Be prepared to tell them about yourself.

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Memorial Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was a phone and zoom meeting with in person at the end. Very long onboarding process though having to do physicals and drug testing. Easy enough and standard questions. If you can write a grammatically correct email and manage a calendar it’s fine.

title: Education Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Memorial Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Two separate zoom interviews (after submitting resume online).  Interview process took over a month between calls.  First call was with director then they brought on some other team members I would be working with directly. Interview was formal and went over my resume (how experience there would apply to the job).
Interview Questions: What are some challenges at your previous employment and how did you handle them?

title: Nurse Residency Program Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Memorial Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a Panel style Interview with about 5-6 people interviewing the candidates. Each person took turns asking questions. Everyone was very nice and created a comfortable environment. It lasted about 20 minutes.
Interview Questions: How have you handled a difficult patient?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Memorial Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: DInterview process was a bit lengthy.  Waited a couple of weeks to hear back on whether a position was being offered or not. Recruiter was helpful. Manager seemed very nice, but position was not offered
Interview Questions: What are your skills for positoon

title: Receptionist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Community Memorial Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: had to describe situations in a work place, was fairly easy got hired right on the spot. Got interviewed by 2 people. I studied all night for the interview. I asked questions in the end aswell
Interview Questions:
work experience
tell me about yourself
are you organized

title: Telemetry RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Memorial Healthcare (Ventura, CA) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: initial conversation over phone, then invited me to come for in person interview. it was the manager and supervisor asking questions. quesstions were mostly "what would you do in this situation" They were very pleasant and easy to talk to.
Interview Questions: How would you handle an upset family member?

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Community Memorial Healthcare (Ventura, CA)
Interview Descriptions: It was a very friendly interview with lots of the basic questions. I was asked, "Tell me about yourself, greatest strengths and weaknesses, greatest professional achievement, how do you handle conflicts, greatest challenge in the role, etc."

title: Help Desk Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Community Memorial Healthcare (Ventura, CA) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very casual interview process. They ask some technical questions but are more concerned with customer service. This is a job that can be learned over time so they are more concerned with how you interact with users and solve problems. They just want to make sure you have a good attitude.
Interview Questions: How would you fix a printer remotely? What steps would you take?

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Community Memorial Healthcare (Ventura, CA) in Jul 2011
Interview Descriptions: The interview was done by a ntimidating man who spoke very little, his strategy was to let you fill the silence with nervous conversation in order to throw off your whole game plan and expose more of yourself than you planned on. A couple times I didn't have anything more to add to my response so we sat in silence while he stared at me.
